meanings.definition: A drop of salty liquid secreted by glands in the eyes, typically when experiencing strong emotion.
meanings.sent1: Her face was wet with teardrops after watching the sad movie.
meanings.sent2: She wiped away the teardrops that fell during the heartfelt speech.
meanings.sent3: The clown's exaggerated teardrops painted on his face made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The teardrops of rain on the window blurred her view of the outside world.
meanings.sent5: The teardrops on her cheeks glistened in the sunlight, reflecting her sorrow.
